name: @resize.to/aws-lambda-s3-404
description: A serverless framework based lambda to resize images on 404 from s3.

scripts.prepackage: rm -rf node_modules/sharp && docker run --rm -v "$PWD":/var/task lambci/lambda:build-nodejs8.10 npm install

author: Brandon Aaron <hello.brandon@aaron.sh> (http://brandon.aaron.sh/)
